The transparent widget can make only ON transparent, only OFF transparent, or both ON and OFF transparent, and can hide recording status by hiding or showing a widget as a combination such as camera, gallery, folder, etc.
One of the biggest advantages of the SC recorder is that users can freely do a secrete recording by changing widget icons.
